entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
